description: This file defines the WishlistScreen widget for a Flutter app, rendering a grid of wishlist books with a CTA for each book.

classes.name: WishlistScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget that displays a grid of wishlist books with a CTA button.

methods.name: _openProduct
methods.description: Navigates to the product detail page for a given book using named routes.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the wishlist screen, displaying the wishlist items in a grid.
